dt-example.title: Defaults
dt-example.info:
Being able to configure default values for RowReorder and enable it by default on DataTables can be quite useful. Defaults for RowReorder can be configured on the `$.fn.dataTable.RowReorder.defaults` object or `$.fn.dataTable.defaults.rowReorder`.
This example shows both being used, with RowReorder being configured to use the whole row as a selector.
